articles.author: Ian Harnett
articles.title: The financial turmoil is not over - Financial Times
articles.description: If 2022 was about the repricing of capital, 2023 is likely to be about the reduction in the quantity of it
articles.content:
The writer is co-founder and chief investment strategist at Absolute Strategy Research
Theres an old investment saying that bull markets last longer than you think possible and bear markets hit hard… [+4636 chars]

articles.author: Spyros Georgilidakis
articles.title: Virgin Orbit Ceases Operations, Lays Off Staff - Mentour Pilot
articles.description: In a message to staff, the Virgin Orbit CEO announced that the company will lay off all but 100 people, and effectively cease operations.
articles.content:
In a message to staff, the Virgin Orbit CEO announced that the company will lay off all but 100 people, and effectively cease operations.Image: Virgin Orbit/Greg Robinson
